casebody.data:
Maria I. ALVAREZ, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
John A. TORTORA, Defendant-Petitioner. C-521 September Term 2017
080004 Supreme Court of New Jersey. February 9, 2018 *1271To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-003379-14 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
